## Safety Checklist
If this PR involves telescope/enclosure control or safety systems:
- [ ] Changes do not bypass safety interlocks
- [ ] Weather safety checks remain functional
- [ ] Emergency stop functionality preserved
- [ ] Graceful shutdown sequence intact
- [ ] Tool confirmation prompts maintained for destructive actions

## Testing
- [ ] Unit tests pass (`pytest tests/unit/`)
- [ ] Integration tests pass (`pytest tests/integration/`)
- [ ] Manually tested with simulators
- [ ] Tested with actual hardware (if applicable)

## Voice Commands
If this PR adds/modifies voice commands:
- [ ] Command documented in VOICE_COMMANDS.md
- [ ] Natural language variations tested
- [ ] Response messages are clear and concise
- [ ] Confirmation required for safety-critical commands

## Documentation
- [ ] Code comments added/updated
- [ ] README updated (if needed)
- [ ] API documentation updated (if needed)
- [ ] Configuration examples updated (if needed)
